text: The Green Animalist Party (, acronym PVA) is a Uruguayan conservative green party established in 2018, which places a particular emphasis on animal rights. On 30 June 2019, its candidates took part in the primary elections and gained the right to participate in the October general election. Their presidential candidate will be Gustavo Salle, together with Enrique Viana. == References == Category:Green political parties in Uruguay Category:2018 establishments in Uruguay Category:Animal advocacy parties Category:Political parties established in 2018 Category:Environment of Uruguay
title: Green Animalist Party
